prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Jack London, Accession # 6240-k, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift to the Library on November 22, 1972.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of an oil painting by F. Stick for Jack London's The Night-Born.
